entry.def: Shellfish are small creatures that live in the sea and have a shell.

example.ex: Fish and shellfish are the specialities.

means.word_mean: 1. meat of edible aquatic invertebrate with a shell (especially a mollusk or crustacean)
2. invertebrate having a soft unsegmented body usually enclosed in a shell
